sections.description: WordPress Barbershop: Barber is a stylish theme designed and developed by our team. The theme has a clear and optimized code that ensures the speed of the website. By the way, the theme is SEO optimized and fully responsive, which is another big advantage. It comes with various options and features that allow you to create a fully functional and powerful website. WordPress Barbershop: Barber theme comes with a built-in custom homepage. The custom homepage has various built-in and ready-made sections. The following sections are available Banner, Call to Action, Products, Sales, Advantages, Achievements, Services, and Lates Posts. Some of these services are included only in the premium version of the theme. All of these sections are fully customizable, so you can easily change the default settings and texts and replace them with your own. You can also enable/disable the section you don't need. The Barbershop: Barber theme is also integrated with WooCommerce, so you can add different services and products and shop or process payments with WooCommerce. This is another advantage of our theme. As we mentioned, there are many options to control the overall design of your site. You can change the position of the sidebar or simply hide it, change the background color of different sections, change the color of text and links, change the style of buttons, and much more. Various layout sizes are available for different parts of the website. For example, if you need to display the top bar in full width, you can do so without any problem. Other parts like header, main content, WooCommerce pages, and footer also have this option. It should be noted that this is a premium feature. WordPress Barbershop: Barber theme also comes with breadcrumbs feature which is a big plus for improving the SEO of the website. There are also other features that will enhance the functionality of the website, so it will be better if you check the entire list of features on the theme page on our website or visit the demo page to see the theme in action.
